alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 02 at 6:17PM CST until December 03 at 6:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Lower Plaquemines, Lower St. Bernard, Southeast St. Tammany and Eastern Orleans Parishes. In Mississippi, Northern Hancock, Northern Harrison, Northern Jackson, Southern Hancock, Southern Harrison and Southern Jackson Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy dense fog can cause rapid changes to visibility on the road.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hancock; Northern Harrison; Northern Jackson; Southern Hancock; Southern Harrison; Southern Jackson
